trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason why a cache entry was removed or an entry is about to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 指定某个缓存项被移除或的条目是要删除的原因。

trans-unit.source: The CacheEntryRemovedReason enumeration is used to provide a predefined set of reasons why a cache entry was removed or is about to be removed.
trans-unit.target: CacheEntryRemovedReason 枚举用于提供一组预定义的某个缓存项已删除或要从中删除的原因。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedArguments> class takes a CacheEntryRemovedReason value as one of the parameter to pass to a callback method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedArguments>类采用 CacheEntryRemovedReason 值作为要传递到回调方法的参数之一。</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedArguments>

trans-unit.source: A cache entry was evicted for as reason that is defined by a particular cache implementation.
trans-unit.target: 有关原因定义特定的缓存实现的情况下，缓存条目已被逐出。

trans-unit.source: A cache entry was removed because a related dependency (such as a file or another cache entry) triggered eviction of the cache entry.
trans-unit.target: 因为相关的依赖项 （如文件或另一个缓存条目） 触发逐出缓存项的已删除某个缓存项。

trans-unit.source: A cache entry was removed to free memory in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 已到缓存中的可用内存中删除某个缓存项。

trans-unit.source: This occurs when a cache instance approaches cache-specific memory limits, or when a process or cache instance approaches computer-wide memory limits.
trans-unit.target: 当缓存实例接近特定于缓存的内存限制，或进程或缓存实例接近计算机范围内的内存限制时，将发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: A cache entry was removed because it expired.
trans-unit.target: 因为它已过期，已删除某个缓存项。

trans-unit.source: Expiration can be based on an absolute time or on a sliding expiration time.
trans-unit.target: 可以根据过期，绝对时间或滑动过期时间。

trans-unit.source: A cache entry was removed by using the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Remove*> or <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Set*> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用删除某个缓存项<> *1> 或<> *1> 方法。
